definition: to lift oneself out of poverty
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
poor/inadequate/deficient/garrulous
to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation

sentences.english: Bashfulness is an enemy to poverty.
Farmers in this region quickly got rid of poverty and became better off after the establishment of the agricultural economic system.
sentences.chinese: 大农业体系的建立，使这个地区的农民很快脱贫致富。

sentences.english: But poverty is a more outstanding issue in a sub-watershed upstream, poverty is an important cause of eco-environment degradation.
sentences.chinese: 对流域内的人们而言，脱贫是最为迫切的目标。

sentences.english: Discussions about meeting anti-poverty and development goals went virtually ignored.
sentences.chinese: 有关实现脱贫和发展目标等议题的讨论几乎形同虚设。

sentences.english: "Eliminating poverty in rural areas is the most difficult challenge to building a moderately prosperous society, " said Xi.
sentences.chinese: 农村贫困人口脱贫是全面建成小康社会最艰巨的任务。

sentences.english: Helping women relieve from their poverty.
sentences.chinese: 帮助贫困妇女脱贫解困。

sentences.english: Anyway, how does sending a rocket to the moon help the peasants of Gansu?
sentences.chinese: 退一步讲，登月计划如何能帮助甘肃的农民脱贫？

sentences.english: Make a large number of poor areas, while on the road of poverty.
sentences.chinese: 使一大批老少边贫地区走上了脱贫致富的道路。
人人都锺爱他脱贫致富的故事。

sentences.english: She didn't forget to help those with financial difficulties out of poverty after she became rich.
sentences.chinese: 她家生活富裕后没有忘记帮助困难户脱贫。

sentences.english: Everyone edge to make a large number of poor areas of poverty onto the road.
sentences.chinese: 使一大批老少边贫地区走上了脱贫致富的道路。

sentences.english: The choice of poverty, make way more walk more spacious.
sentences.chinese: 这种选择，使脱贫致富的路子越走越宽广。

sentences.english: Such an option, so that the broad road of poverty.
sentences.chinese: 这种选择，使脱贫致富的路子越走越宽广。

sentences.english: Still, they have turned a poor village into one of the region's wealthiest.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，贾森的村子还是脱贫致富，又富甲一方。
